task_1_specification.dimensions: Length: 12 inches, Width: 4 inches (adjustable wrist strap)
task_1_specification.materials: Nitrile-coated polyester, reinforced fingertips, breathable fabric
task_1_specification.performance_criteria: Must meet ANSI/ISEA 105-2016 Cut Level A4, puncture resistance of 50 Newtons, chemical resistance to common industrial solvents
task_1_specification.additional_requirements: Must be ambidextrous, have textured grip pattern, and include conductive fingertips for touchscreen compatibility. Packaging must include individual polybags with lot numbering for traceability.

task_2_review.issue_description: Material specification lists 'high-quality steel' without defining alloy composition or hardness requirements
task_2_review.suggested_correction: Specify exact alloy grade (e.g., AISI 304 stainless steel) and Rockwell hardness range (e.g., HRC 45-50)

task_2_review.issue_description: Dimensional tolerances are missing for critical components
task_2_review.suggested_correction: Add ±0.5mm tolerance for all machined surfaces and ±1° for angular measurements

task_2_review.issue_description: Performance testing section references outdated standard (ASTM F1234-2010)
task_2_review.suggested_correction: Update to current ASTM F1234-2023 standard and specify required testing laboratory accreditation

task_2_review.issue_description: Packaging requirements omit important details about moisture protection
task_2_review.suggested_correction: Add requirement for vacuum-sealed packaging with desiccant packets for moisture-sensitive components

task_2_review.issue_description: No provision for quality documentation submission
task_2_review.suggested_correction: Require submission of material certificates, first article inspection reports, and full QC documentation with each shipment
